Reviews.Title: “Cosy well located appartment hotel”
Reviews.Author: prod_dev_travel
Reviews.Content: Recent and comfortable hotel wil large fully equipped rooms. Tasteful decoration, nice bathroom and excellent breakfast. A very good place to stay to visit the chic new part of European side of Istanbul. A few minutes walk from the Bosphore ferries. Fairly far from the metro or train station or from the old part of istanbul. If visiting istanbul, a good option to move to after having stayed in the old istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “exellent, fantastic hotel, fantastic staff”
Reviews.Author: PANAGIOTIS A
Reviews.Content: exellent hotel in the best place of Istanbul. You can walk and to visit all the historical places. In 15 minutes you wiil be in the Kabatas train terminal . Very quite and confortable rooms. Nice varity of breakfast. Safe parking place. I will stay again and again in this hotel' Panagiotis, Greece.

Reviews.Title: “A great solution for leisure and business travels”
Reviews.Author: gda27
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is located in a very modern neighbourhood and the staff is very nice and kind. The breakfast (included in the room rate) was very good. The room itself was big, with a real living room with table and tv, kitchenette, bathroom and a very big walk-in closet. A really good solution for all those who like to be able to cook some food in their room. Near to the Hotel you'll find some nice bar and restaurants and a very good supermarket (Migros). The taxi station is just on the other side of the street and you can reach the bus stop walking (about 15 minutes). The docks from where boats can bring you to the Golden Horn and the asian side of Istanbul are very close to the Hotel. We appreciated the little private gym at the upper floor. Really perfect if you need to reach the BahÃ§eÅŸehir Ãœniversitesi.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Wififox
Reviews.Content: A very nice hotel in one of the best nieghberhoods in Istanbul...i spcially like the kichnette

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel. Excellent Staff”
Reviews.Author: Fazaa
Reviews.Content: The Best experince ever in Istanbul. More than words can say!

Reviews.Title: “Homy Hotel !!”
Reviews.Author: Maxima_Max
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Houses Suites and Apartments were very pleasant. Our flight was early and they were kind enough to offer us an early check in. The room was almost like home ! very clean and neat. The Bathroom was clean and modern .. The kitchenette was fully equipped .. The dressing room was handy .. The air conditioning was cool ( neither hot nor cold). The bed was comfortable and we asked for extra pillows .. The hotel is near a small supermarket where we can buy most of our staff . Its near something like downtown where there are lots of shops and restaurants .. The location of the hotel in a very high standard street! it has an amazing view at night .. Oh I forgot about the free wifi! it was the BEST thing .. And the response time for our inquires was so fast .. The Rani restaurant was pleasant as well .. we loved the organic breakfast .. all food came from the farms as we asked!! They played a classic Turkish music which gave us a great Turkish feeling!! There is only one bad thing about the location of the hotel, as we were walking not taking any transportation, it is over a hill so we had to walk up the hill which was very tiring for us specially after walking the hole day and holding our shopping bags ! but it is a good exercise though! There is a great park nearby, you can go there and forget the whole world behind you! amazing greenery and birds sounds! Transportation is not far from the location, there is a bus station nearby, and you can walk down to the streets, little bit a head then you will find a tram station. The general atmosphere of both the hotel and the restaurant was excellent.. It is recommended for future visits.

Reviews.Title: “A nice hotel for Istanbul visiting.”
Reviews.Author: CanaanKao
Reviews.Content: During the 2011/07/04~2011/07/11, I attended a conference held at BahÃ§eÅŸehir University in Istanbu. The hotel is a nice place near BahÃ§eÅŸehir university, New Palace and the metro T1 station. It is very convenient to sight seeing and taking photo by T1. If you are the visitors of BahÃ§eÅŸehir University as me, the hotel is your best choose.

Reviews.Title: “Nice suites”
Reviews.Author: mc378
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my stay at Housez Suites and Apartments. It was a bit out-of-the-way from the hustle and bustle, but this is part of its charm. The rooms were clean. The kitchen was small as expected. The bathrooms were sparkling new and stylishly designed. Free Wi-Fi was useful. The only negative was the quality of the pillows. They were terrible; I've had nicer pillows at Super 8 and Motel 6 in the U.S. Breakfast was so-so, and it was difficult to get a refill on coffee, However, I do not stay at hotels because of the breakfast. Overall, this suite hotel is reasonably priced, quiet and comfortable, and I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet 5 star accomodation for a three Star Price.”
Reviews.Author: Docgsib
Reviews.Content: Spent 3 nights for a business meeting in the area. The room was basically a new furnished 1 bedroom apartment with a sofa,bed,arm chair ,large LCD TV , kitchen Ed fully equipped and a great bathroom full of everything one needs from the toothbrush to the bath robes like any top level 5 star hotel. Very friendly staff and a nice cozy restaurant with decent food. The price is a great Plus for such a luxury accommodation. Will definitely come back "

Reviews.Title: “Excellent quality, good service, price/quality might improve”
Reviews.Author: PaulOvertoom
Reviews.Content: We (family of four, children are adults) stayed for three nights in two spacious apartments. It is situated in a busy street in MaÃ§ka (close to the Istanbul Swissotel), only two minutes away from the Bosphorus and the DolmabahÃ§e Paace. We loved the rooms. They were well equipped, silent and had excellent beds (no footboards so our length (son is 6.6, daughter 6.2) was not a problem). The shower could hardly have been better. Plenty of water, big shower head an a hand sprayer. Large cabin. Internet was old fashioned and only allows one user at any time. Login through a slow and imprecise site. The airco was more of a problem, though. We tried to cool the room but even selecting 15 degreed Celsius did not yield a cool room for the night. We paid 150,= a room per night, including breakfast. Not bad, but not great value either. We will keep the hotel high on our preference list.

Reviews.Title: “Beautifully new, clean, and spacious”
Reviews.Author: ProfessorEnglish
Reviews.Content: Handy kitchenette, large shower, comfortable bed, quiet setting, healthy and plentiful breakfast, reasonably accessible to major sites; near Dolmabace Palace.

Reviews.Title: “Definetely recommended for istanbul's business travellers”
Reviews.Author: wrldtrvlr02
Reviews.Content: Because of my biz I have been living both in istanbul and london once I was searching internet i have stumbled upon www.luxuryistanbul.com in its business traveler section i have found Housez suites and apartments it was absolutely great apart hotel for business you can feel yourself like at home. Modern designed nice rooms, very nice ambiance and has a great location. The most important thing is close to the istanbul convention center, hilton exhibition center etc. i think you must try it, cheers

Reviews.Title: “Great place for families”
Reviews.Author: ma65
Reviews.Content: Very comfortable suites and beds, room enough for a family of four (children 10 and 12). Very friendly and helpful staff. Good products at the little organic shop on the bottom floor (and there is a supermarket a few meters away). I used the kitchenette in the suite to cook a (simple) meal. A couple of downsides: the rooms overlooking the street are noisy, in spite of the double glazing. Ask for one in the back, or bring good ear plugs (can also be bought at the pharmacy across the street) ; as for breakfast, I would not mind having some juice (they served a good fresh orange juice, but at an extra cost) and good coffee (espresso or other; again, espresso was at extra cost). The coffee served tastes a bit like instant coffee. As for location, it is walking distance to the beautiful Dolmabahce Palace, and to the ferry at Besiktas, from where you can cross the Bosphorus to the asian side and to the Princes Islands. Taxis to the old town (Sultanahmet) cost around 10-12 TL

Reviews.Title: “Housez, Istanbul: Great place and value, wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: AGettig
Reviews.Content: I had to go to Istanbul for a big conference, which was held at the Swissotel Bosphorus. I was asked to go at the last minute, and the Swissotel was booked full. I found the Housez a 5 minute walk away and at 1/3 the price of the 'special' group rate offered at the Swissotel. Nice room, nice size desk to do real work at, sofa and chair for comfortable reading, nice bed, bathroom, even a mini kitchen. The restaurant downstairs was nice for breakfast, and the staff were really excellent. Be clear, this hotel is not to be confused with the Swissotel Bosphorus - it doesn't have the size or the shopping or extensive views, etc. But I was not in Istanbul for all of that, I was there to work and attend the meetings, and Housez was a great solution I would recommend to anyone. I had broken my hip weeks earlier and was going to require a wheelchair. The staff found one and rented it for me, met me at the airport and helped me with my luggage both ways. I asked them several times for help with requests for help and local knowledge, and they were always exceptional. Exceptional service - that is something I have never written in a review before. This nice little place earned their good reputation.

Reviews.Title: “My favorite place to stay in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: jbn80
Reviews.Content: Room is clean, spacious, beautiful shower and bathroom. Quiet and in a nice neighborhood away from busy tourist area . The breatkfasts fantastic and healthy, all organic. Good fitness room. The only downside to some would be that it is not in walking distance to Sultanmet or major tourist sites. But for me, being by the Bosphorus and in walking distance to Ortokoy was a big plus.

Reviews.Title: “Convenience, hospitality, youth & colours”
Reviews.Author: arifff
Reviews.Content: Clean, comfortable, with big rooms (or even better apartments), a nice kitchen for one or two persons. Serviceable personnel & good management. I have only one objection: i expect even better & wider variety of goods at breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “A hotel that feels like a house”
Reviews.Author: VELathens
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at this hotel for a month and really feels like home. Tha service is perfect and the personel is very kind. Also the breakfast is very tasty!

Reviews.Title: “The definition of hospitality in Istanbul, ideal for every purpose.”
Reviews.Author: p_afchoudias
Reviews.Content: I have spent more than one month in Housez Hotel and i have been absolutely satisfied by their hospitality. The stuff is friendly in the maximum degree and it is willing to solve any problems that may occur, the quantity (25) and the quality (fine small apartments) provides traveller with a feeling of being in his house while residing in a foreign country, room cleanliness and service is perfect, the breakfast is exclusively made by organic products, the variety of the cheese offered - available for purchase too - is so tasteful that you have to buy for your own use as well, the location of the hotel is both close to the city centre and in a wonderful street, centre of fashion and arts, the trasportation to and from the hotel is very easy and smart (depending on your destination, you can easily avoid Istanbul's greatest problem; traffic). I have been coming to Istanbul for business and recreational reasons the last 6 years, and i can wholeheartly say that i have just found the best place to stay for the years to follow.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay at Housez”
Reviews.Author: Dandoun2010
Reviews.Content: It's a very clean place with great location. Rooms are spacious with good amenities.The staff are very friendly and helpful. They did their best to make our stay as comfortable as possible. We loved the organic breakfast and we enjoyed the service at the restaurant. Our stay was a pleasure. We sure are going back to this hotel for our next visit to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “This is a place where you can feel at home in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Nejla_Ozgur
Reviews.Content: The hotel's place is in the center of the city, but you don't feel the chaos of the big city. Our room was very confortable. All the staff is very friendly and helpful. We really enjoyed the breakfast. The only problem was that the heating was with air condition which prevented us from sleeping well and made us feel unhealthy.

Reviews.Title: “more than a home comfort”
Reviews.Author: AYSEKoln
Reviews.Content: Great locatin , very clean and comfortable rooms , delicious breakfast and good service

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place for families”
Reviews.Author: shaiban
Reviews.Content: It was a very nice experience as the hotel is located in a perfect location,, Rooms and bathrooms were nice and clean Kitchens were full equipped We liked the organic breakfast :) Friendly staff Prices are little bit high No room service

HotelInfo.Name: Housez Suites and Apartments
HotelInfo.Address: Suleyman Seba Caddesi No 60, Istanbul 80000, Turkey
